text.レース中間からロングスパートをかけて\\n速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>From the middle of the race slightly increase your speed by running a long spurt\n</size>
text.残り200mを切って前の方にいると\\n競り合いに強くなり速度が少し上がる: <size=22>Increase speed and power lightly when close to the lead in last 200m\n</size>
text.レース後半に前の方で\\n1番になる力をわずかに発揮する: <size=22>Be in the lead during the 2nd half of the race to show off your ability to take 1st place\n</size>
text.最終直線で後ろの方から追い抜くと\\n末脚を使って速度が少し上がる: <size=22>Lightly increase speed when passing in the back in Final Leg straight.\n</size>
text.最終直線で余力を持って前にいると\\nわずかに優位を保ちやすくなる: <size=22>Slightly easier to keep advantage if you have enough strength in the Final Leg straight\n</size>
text.最終コーナーで中団以降から追い抜くと\\n女帝たる走りで速度が少し上がる: <size=22>When passing from the midfield or further down in the last corner, slightly increase your speed with steps befitting an empress\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前の方で競り合うと\\n直線でわずかに抜け出しやすくなる: <size=22>When battling near the front from the final corner on, breaking away on the straight becomes a little easier\n</size>
text.レース終盤のコーナーで前の位置に\\nつこうとして加速力が少し上がる: <size=22>Gain a slight increase in acceleration as you attempt to gain positions during the last corner of the race\n</size>
text.レース後半のコーナーで控えていると\\n持久力が少し回復し\\nさらに少しの間速: <size=22>When holding steady in a corner during the race's second half, recover a bit of energy, and increase speed a little bit for a short while\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に競り合っていると\\n最終直線で前方にいる時\\n強い気持ちが: <size=22>When battling from the final corner on, slightly increase speed in line with your strong spirit when near the front on the final straight\n</size>
text.レース後半に前の方で競り合うとバク\\nシン力（？）を発揮、速度が少し上がる: <size=22>While fighting for the lead during the second part of the race, lightly increase your speed through displaying your Bakushin power\n</size>
text.レース中盤で好位置にいる時に\\n持久力が回復する: <size=22>Be in good position during Middle Leg to recover endurance\n</size>
text.最終コーナーで後ろの方にいると近くの\\nウマ娘を見て持久力を少し回復する: <size=22>Being at the back during the last corner, lightly restores your endurance when you see another horse girl\n</size>
text.レース終盤に前方が詰まると\\nお告げの力で少し道を切り開く: <size=22>If during the Last Leg of the race your way to the front of the field is blocked, your power of divination will make it lightly easier to spot an opening\n</size>
text.レース終盤で3番手の時に負けそうに\\nなると闘志に火が付き速度が少し上がる: <size=22>When you're in 3rd place at the end of the race and about to lose, you gain a little bit more fighting spirit and lightly increase your speed\n</size>
text.レースを冷静に運ぶことができると\\n残り200mで実力発揮、速度が上がる: <size=22>If you can get calm and composed through the race, you will be able to showcase your ability and increase your speed for the last 200m\n</size>
text.レース中間付近で中団にいるとき\\n気合を入れ直して持久力を少し回復し\\nさら: <size=22>When in the middle of the pack around half distance, pick yourself up by recovering a bit of energy and increase speed slightly\n</size>
text.レース終盤に前の方で相手を抜くと\\n勢いに乗って速度が上がり\\nさらに加速力: <size=22>Overtake the opponent in front of you during the Last Leg of the race to gain momentum and increase speed, as well as slightly increase acceleration\n</size>
text.レース後半に差を付けて先頭にいると\\nさらなる脚を使って、速度を上げる: <size=22>Be in the lead with a gap behind you during the latter race half to increase your speed, making even more use of your legs\n</size>
text.最終直線で前と差が詰まると\\n華麗な脚取りで速度がすごく上がる: <size=22>Close down the leader on the final straight to greatly increase your speed even further through your brilliant leg work\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降で前の方にいると\\nギアを変えて加速力が上がる: <size=22>Increase acceleration from final corner onward by changing gears when in the front group\n</size>
text.最終直線で前の方で少し抜け出ていると\\n輝きを増し速度がすごく上がる: <size=22>If you're in front at the final straight and manage to break out a little, increase speed greatly\n</size>
text.残り200m地点で前の方にいると\\n道を開いてすごく抜け出しやすくなる: <size=22>Be close to the lead during the last 200m to make it easier to break through and find a way through the field\n</size>
text.レース中間からロングスパートをかけて\\n速度が少しずつ上がる: <size=22>Gradually increase speed during the long spurt in Middle Leg\n</size>
text.残り200mを切って前の方にいると\\n競り合いに強くなり速度が上がる: <size=22>Increase speed and power when close to the lead in last 200m\n</size>
text.レース後半に前の方で\\n1番になる力を発揮する: <size=22>Display your power to take the lead when near the front during the latter half of the race\n</size>
text.最終直線が迫ったとき好位置にいると\\n弾みを付けて加速力が上がる: <size=22>Be in a good position when nearing the final straight to gain momentum and increase your acceleration\n</size>
text.最終直線で後ろの方から追い抜くと\\n末脚を使って速度が上がる: <size=22>Increase speed when passing in the back in Final Leg straight\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に後ろの方から\\n外を回って追い抜いていると\\n最終直線で速: <size=22>Gain speed on the last straight when passing around the outside in the back from the final corner on\n</size>
text.最終コーナーで前の方にいると\\n抜かせない覚悟を決めて速度が上がる: <size=22>Be close to the lead in the final corner to gain speed as you resolve yourself to not be overtaken\n</size>
text.最終直線で余力を持って前にいると\\nより優位を保ちやすくなる: <size=22>Easier to keep a good position in last straight with spare energy\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前の方で\\n前または後ろのウマ娘と距離が近いと\\n王たる輝: <size=22>When near the front from the last corner on and close to the horsegirl in front or behind, increase speed through your kingly radiance\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降で外から追い抜くと\\n怪物的な力で、速度を上げる\\n中盤競り: <size=22>Increase speed with monstrous power from final corner onward when passing from outside, more so when you were battling in the Mid Leg\n</size>
text.レース終盤に3回追い抜くと\\n最終直線で速度がすごく上がる: <size=22>During the Last Leg of the race make three overtakes to strongly increase your speed on the final straight\n</size>
text.最終コーナーで中団以降から追い抜くと\\n女帝たる走りで速度が上がる: <size=22>When passing from the midfield or further down in the last corner, increase your speed with steps befitting an empress\n</size>
text.レース終盤に2回追い抜くと間近で拝む\\nウマ娘ちゃんのあまりの尊さに思わず\\: <size=22>When overtaking twice in the Last Leg, inadvertently increase speed and take a better line from seeing the precious horsegirls up close\n</size>
text.レース終盤のコーナーで先頭にいると\\nこれ幸いと加速力を上げる: <size=22>On last corner, gain acceleration when in the first position\n</size>
text.レース後半の直線で好位置にいる\\nまたは中団から前を狙うと\\n稲妻の如く駆け: <size=22>Bolt like lightning on a straight in the latter half when in a good position or moving up from the middle of the pack\n</size>
text.レース後半に好位置で競り合うと\\n走ることに心を躍らせて\\n速度を上げる: <size=22>A heart-throbbing competition for a good position in the race's latter half increases your speed\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前の方で追い抜くと\\n勝利の方程式を導き、速度を上げる: <size=22>Increase speed when near the front and passing from the last corner on\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前の方で競り合うと\\n直線で抜け出しやすくなる: <size=22>After battling near the front from the last corner on, it becomes easier to break away during the final straight\n</size>
text.レース後半に中団から\\n『お友達』を追って速度を少しずつ上げ\\n前方のウマ娘: <size=22>In the race's second half, chase "friends" from the middle of the pack, gradually increasing speed and slightly slowing girls ahead.\n</size>
text.最終直線までみずから崩れることなく\\n前の方にいると速度が上がる: <size=22>Make no mistakes and be in the front at the final straight to increase your speed\n</size>
text.レース終盤のコーナーで前の位置に\\nつこうとして加速力が上がる: <size=22>Increase acceleration as you attempt to overtake in last corner\n</size>
text.レース中間に好位置で少し疲れてくると\\n気合を入れ直して大きく前へ踏み込む: <size=22>If you get a little tired while being in a good position in the middle of the race, your speed and acceleration increase\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に追い抜いて\\n先団についていると最終直線で\\n強い意志を持: <size=22>Break away with the leading group from the last corner on to steel your will and increase your speed\n</size>
text.残り300m付近で前の方だと速度を少し\\n上げる、ちょうど坂を上りきったところ: <size=22>Increase speed slightly when in the leading places with around 300m to go, highly so after just climbing a hill\n</size>
text.レース後半のコーナーで控えていると\\n持久力を回復し\\nさらに少しの間速度を: <size=22>When holding steady in a corner during the race's second half, recover energy, and slightly increase speed for a little while\n</size>
text.最終直線で先頭から離されていると\\n星に導かれるように速度が上がる\\n最後方: <size=22>When far from the front on the final straight, increase speed as if guided by the stars. Greatly so if all the way near the back\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に競り合っていると\\n最終直線で前方にいる時\\n強い気持ちが: <size=22>When battling from the final corner on, increase speed in line with your strong spirit when near the front on the final straight\n</size>
text.最終直線まで冷静に自身の計画通り\\n走行出来れば、先頭目がけて鋭い脚で\\n速: <size=22>If you manage to keep your composure until the final straight, your speed will increase\n</size>
text.レース中間付近で好位置にいる時に\\n追い抜くと勢いづき進出を開始する: <size=22>Gain momentum while in a good position when passing someone in the Middle Leg\n</size>
text.最終直線を走行中に競り合うと\\n可憐にぶっ飛ばして速度を上げる: <size=22>When battling on the last straight, increase speed with a graceful drive\n</size>
text.レース後半に中団から仕掛け始める時に\\n持てるパフォーマンスを発揮して\\n加: <size=22>In the race's second half, increase acceleration if you start overtaking from the middle of the pack\n</size>
text.レース後半に前の方で競り合うと\\nバクシン力（？）を発揮、速度が上がる: <size=22>During the later half of the race, your speed increases when competing for the lead\n</size>
text.レース中盤で好位置にいる時に\\n持久力がすごく回復する: <size=22>Recover a large amount of energy when in a good position during the Middle Leg\n</size>
text.レース中盤の直線で前の方にいるとき\\n後ろのウマ娘と距離が近いと\\n譲らない: <size=22>When near the front on a Mid Leg straight with a horsegirl close behind, your unyielding spirit becomes your power\n</size>
text.最終直線を走行中に好位置で\\n追い抜くまたは詰め寄られると\\nテンションを上: <size=22>If you overtake or are about to be overtaken on the final straight while in a good position, your speed will increase\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降で中団から\\n前へ出る時、切れ味が増し速度が上がる: <size=22>From the last corner on, when coming up from the midfield or lower, your focus sharpens to increase speed\n</size>
text.レース中盤のコーナーで競り合っていた\\n場合、終盤かつ最終コーナー半ば以降に\: <size=22>Increase acceleration when in a good position from the 2nd half of a Final Leg Corner on, and having battled in a Mid Leg Corner\n</size>
text.最終コーナーで後ろの方にいると近くの\\nウマ娘を見て持久力を回復する: <size=22>When in the back in last corner, restore your endurance when you see another horse girl\n</size>
text.レース終盤に前方が詰まると\\nお告げの力で道を切り開く: <size=22>When the front is packed during the Last Leg of the race, the oracle's power will open a path\n</size>
text.レース終盤のコーナーで\\n中団以降のポジションから追い抜くと\\nあきらめない: <size=22>During the Last Leg, when overtaking from outside the front of the pack during a corner, display your unyielding spirit to move further forwards\n</size>
text.落ち着いたまま、中盤の仕掛けどころの\\nまたは終盤の勝負どころのコーナーを\\: <size=22>Having kept your calm in the middle of the pack, your high spirits will increase acceleration during the decisive Middle or Final Leg corner\n</size>
text.レース終盤で3番手の時に負けそうにな\\nると秘めた闘志に火が付き速度が上がる: <size=22>When you're in 3rd place at the end of the race and about to lose, your speed increases\n</size>
text.レースを冷静に運ぶことができると残り\\n200mで実力発揮、速度がすごく上がる: <size=22>After proceeding through the race calmly, your speed drastically increases during the last 200m\n</size>
text.レース中間付近で中団にいるとき\\n気合を入れ直して持久力を回復し\\nさらに速: <size=22>When in the middle of the pack around half distance, pick yourself up by recovering energy and increase speed slightly\n</size>
text.最終直線に入ったとき好位置につけて\\nいると強い意志で速度が上がる\\n先頭が: <size=22>Increase speed through strong determination when entering the final straight in a good position, greatly so when near the lead\n</size>
text.前方にいるとき、レース後半の第3\\nコーナーで速度を少し上げる、または\\n終: <size=22>Increase speed slightly when in the lead group in the third corner after half distance, or push strongly forwards on the track's back side during the Final Leg\n</size>
text.残り300mを切って好位置にいるとき\\n前のウマ娘との距離が近いと\\n強い想: <size=22>When in a good position close to the girl ahead with less than 300m to go, your tempestuous spirit blossoms into speed\n</size>
text.最終直線で後ろのウマ娘と距離が近いと\\nこの瞬間に懸け持久力をわずかに使い\\: <size=22>When the horsegirl behind is close on the final straight, put your all in this moment and highly increase your speed for a while at the cost of some stamina\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に追い抜いていた場合\\n残り300mを切って先団にいるとき\\: <size=22>Increase speed through fiery fighting spirit when in the leading group with 300m to go, having made a pass from the Final Corner on\n</size>
text.レース後半に中団から残り持久力に\\n応じたロングスパートをかけて\\n速度をわ: <size=22>Start a long spurt based on remaining energy from the midfield in the race's latter half, slightly and continuously increasing speed\n</size>
text.中盤で2回スキルを使うと\\nよりリラックスして持久力が回復する: <size=22>Restore endurance if you activate two skills in the middle part of the race\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前の方で\\n追いすがっていると最終直線を走行中\\n不屈の闘: <size=22>When chasing someone near the front from the last corner on, greatly increase speed on the last straight\n</size>
text.スキルで持久力を回復すると\\nレース後半で前のほうにいる時に\\nレッツラゴー: <size=22>In the race's second half, increase speed when recovering endurance with skills while in front\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に先団で追い抜くと\\n煌めくような華麗な動きを披露し\\n少し: <size=22>Showcase your graceful motions to greatly increase speed for a short while when overtaking in the midfield from the final corner on\n</size>
text.スキルで持久力を3回以上回復すると\\nレース後半で勝利に向かい\\n呼吸を整え: <size=22>After recovering HP with skills thrice, recover your breath and break strongly for victory\n</size>
text.中盤に後ろの方で順位を下げた時に\\n優しい光で持久力をすごく回復する: <size=22>When passed in the back of the pack during Middle Leg, a gentle glow greatly recovers stamina\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前めで力が尽きかけ\\n詰め寄られると速度を上げ続ける: <size=22>Continuously increase speed in or after the last corner when being pressed in the lead group and stamina is running out\n</size>
text.最終コーナーで中団から前を狙う時\\n魂を燃え滾らせて加速力を上げる: <size=22>On last corner, gain acceleration when aiming for the lead from the middle pack\n</size>
text.残り400m地点で先団だと少しの間\\n速度を上げる、それまでに7回スキルを\\: <size=22>Increase speed when heading the mid pack a little, significantly so if you've used 7 skills\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に先団で\\n詰め寄られると闘志を燃やして\\n速度を上げる: <size=22>If you're about to be overtaken at the front after the final corner, your speed will increase\n</size>
text.レース中盤で前の方から\\n仕掛け始める時に速度が上がる: <size=22>Increase speed in Middle Leg when overtaking someone close to lead\n</size>
text.終盤の直線で前の方にいると意気揚々と\\n速度を上げる、そこが向正面の場合\\n: <size=22>Triumphantly increase speed when leading on a Final Leg straight, also increase acceleration slightly when on the back side of the track\n</size>
text.スタート後からレース後半まで\\n好位置を維持し続けるとレース中盤に\\n勝利へ: <size=22>Maintain a good position until the latter race half to pick your path to victory in the Middle Leg, increasing speed\n</size>
text.最終コーナーで前の方で抜くと速度が\\n後ろの方で抜くと加速力が上がる: <size=22>On last corner, gain speed when passing in front or acceleration when passing in back\n</size>
text.中盤のコーナーで先団を走行中\\n後ろに他ウマ娘を検知すると\\nわずかに息を入: <size=22>When running in front of the pack during a Middle Leg corner and you detect a horsegirl behind, take a small breath and increase your speed\n</size>
text.レース中盤を好位置で走行中に\\n詰め寄られると前方のウマ娘から\\n持久力を吸: <size=22>When chased in a good position during Middle Leg, drain energy from the horsegirls ahead\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に3回追い抜くと\\n抱いた誇りを力に変えて\\n最終直線で速度: <size=22>When overtaking thrice from the final corner on, turn your cherished pride into power, continually speeding up on the final straight.\n</size>
text.最終コーナー走行中に中団で競り合うと\\n抜け出しやすくなる: <size=22>If you're blocked in the middle of the pack at the final corner, it will become easier to get out\n</size>
text.最終直線を好位置で走行中\\n前のウマ娘との距離が近いと\\n抜け出しやすくなる: <size=22>If you're in front after the final corner and about to overtake another girl, your speed and acceleration will increase\n</size>
text.最終コーナーで先頭から離されていると\\nその距離が遠いほど頑張り続けて\\n速: <size=22>When away from the front at the last corner, gradually increase your speed, persisting longer the further away you are\n</size>
text.レース後半に後方で詰め寄られると\\nマシマシの幸運パワーが身体に実り\\n速度: <size=22>In the second part of the race, increase speed when someone is drawing closer to you in the back of the pack\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に追い抜いていた場合\\n最終直線で中団から速度を上げる\\n人: <size=22>Increase speed from the middle pack on the final straight, having made a pass from the final corner on. Spur yourself on longer when not popular\n</size>
text.レース前半、掛からず最後方付近に\\n控え続けていると、最終直線で\\n気合を爆: <size=22>Flare your spirit to increase acceleration on the final straight, having kept your cool in the trailing group during the race's first half\n</size>
text.右回りコースが少し得意になる: <size=22>Become a little better at clockwise tracks\n</size>
text.右回りコースが少し苦手になる: <size=22>Become a little worse at clockwise tracks\n</size>
text.右回りコースが得意になり\\nスピードとパワーが上昇する: <size=22>Become better at clockwise tracks, increasing speed and power\n</size>
text.左回りコースが少し得意になる: <size=22>Become a little better at counterclockwise track\n</size>
text.左回りコースが少し苦手になる: <size=22>Become a little worse at counterclockwise track\n</size>

text.京都レース場が得意になり\\nスタミナと賢さが上昇する: <size=22>Become better at Kyoto Racetrack, increasing stamina and wisdom\n</size>

text.レース中盤に後ろの方にいると\\n速度が上がる＜中距離＞: <size=22>Mid・Increase speed when trailing in the Middle Leg\n</size>

text.レース後半に中団にいると速度が上がり\\nさらに加速力がちょっと上がる\\n＜作: <size=22>Betweener・Increase speed and slightly increase acceleration when in the middle pack during the race's latter half\n</size>
text.レース後半に中団にいると\\n速度がわずかに上がりさらに加速力が\\nほんのちょ: <size=22>Betweener・Slightly increase speed and very slightly increase acceleration when in the middle pack during the race's latter half\n</size>
text.レース中盤に前の方にいると\\n後ろの速度をわずかに下げ\\n自分の速度を上げる: <size=22>Mid・Increase speed while slightly lowering speed of those behind when in the front during Middle Leg\n</size>
text.レース中盤に前の方にいると\\n後ろの速度をほんのわずかに下げ\\n自分の速度を: <size=22>Mid・Increase speed slightly while very slightly lowering speed of those behind when in the front during Middle Leg\n</size>
text.レース中盤にアオハル魂が燃え\\nレース中のチームメンバーの\\nスピード合計が: <size=22>Increase speed in the Middle Leg based on total team member speed\n</size>
text.レース中盤にアオハル魂が燃え\\nレース中のチームメンバーのスピード\\n合計が: <size=22>Increase speed slightly in the Middle Leg based on total team member speed\n</size>
text.レース中盤にアオハル魂が燃え\\nレース中のチームメンバーのスタミナ\\n合計が: <size=22>Recover stamina in the Middle Leg based on total team member stamina\n</size>
text.レース中盤にアオハル魂が燃えレース\\n中のチームメンバーのスタミナ合計が\\n: <size=22>Recover stamina slightly in the Middle Leg based on total team member stamina\n</size>
text.レース終盤にアオハル魂が燃え\\nレース中のチームメンバーの\\nパワー合計が高: <size=22>Increase acceleration during the Final Leg based on total team member power\n</size>
text.レース終盤にアオハル魂が燃え\\nレース中のチームメンバーのパワー\\n合計が高: <size=22>Increase acceleration slightly during the Final Leg based on total team member power\n</size>
text.レース終盤にアオハル魂が燃え\\nレース中のチームメンバーの根性合計が\\n高い: <size=22>Increase speed & accel during the Final Leg based on total team member guts\n</size>
<size=22>Increase speed & accel during the Final Leg based on total team member guts\n</size>
text.レース序盤にアオハル魂が燃えしばらく\\nレース中のチームメンバーの賢さ合計が\: <size=22>Flare your Aoharu Spirit in the Opening Leg, running fixedly ahead based on total team member wisdom\n</size>
<size=22>Flare your Aoharu Spirit in the Opening Leg, running slightly ahead based on total team member wisdom\n</size>
text.レース後半に呼吸を整え前へ踏み込む\\n育成で重ねた勝利の数だけ効果が高まる: <size=22>Catch your breath and break ahead in the race's Latter Half. Effect in training increases with number of wins\n</size>
text.レース後半に\\nちょっと呼吸を整え前へ踏み込む\\n育成で重ねた勝利の数だけ効: <size=22>Catch your breath a little and break ahead in the race's Latter Half. Effect in training increases with number of wins\n</size>
text.レースへの渇望により\\n能力が少し発揮しやすくなる: <size=22>Use your craving to race to demonstrate your abilities a little better\n</size>
text.かつての走りとは違うがあの頃と\\n変わらない想いが能力をすごく上げる: <size=22>Remembering the slightly different yet unchanging running of the past, raise your ability greatly\n</size>
text.見たい景色を必死に追いかけ\\n能力が少し発揮しやすくなる: <size=22>Frantically chasing a dream, you become faster\n</size>
text.トレーナーの恐れが伝播し\\n能力が少し発揮しにくくなる: <size=22>Influenced by your trainer's fear, you become slower\n</size>
text.トレーナーの恐れがより鮮明になり\\nレース後半のコーナーで\\n速度がすごく下: <size=22>Afflicted by your trainer's fear, you slow significantly on a Final Leg corner\n</size>
text.みんなの想いと共に\\nゴールを走り抜ける気持ちを強く持つと\\n最終直線で速度: <size=22>Holding a strong desire to finish with everyone, your speed increases on the final straight\n</size>
text.次のステージを見せてくれる\\n期待を伝えてサイレンススズカの\\n能力を少し発: <size=22>In hopes of seeing what lies beyond, Silence Suzuka's ability is increased\n</size>
text.気持ちよく走れるおまじないをして\\nサイレンススズカの能力を\\n少し発揮しや: <size=22>Under a comfortable running spell, Silence Suzuka's ability is increased\n</size>
text.自分だけの走りを見つけた\\n親友への激励がサイレンススズカの\\n能力を少し発: <size=22>Having found her own running ways, Silence Suzuka's ability is slightly increased in encouragement of her bosom friend\n</size>
text.レース後半のコーナーで思いっきりの\\n応援が届くとサイレンススズカの\\n持久: <size=22>Hearing shouts of support in the latter half, Silence Suzuka recovers HP\n</size>
text.日本一のウマ娘に\\n一歩近づけた手ごたえにより\\n能力が少し発揮しやすくなる: <size=22>Feeling one step closer to being the #1 horsegirl in Japan, displaying your abilities becomes a little easier\n</size>
text.チーム全員が思い入れのあるレースを\\n絶対に勝ちたいという気持ちにより\\n能: <size=22>The desire to win a race that everyone on the team has a passion for makes it much easier to demonstrate your abilities\n</size>
text.レース終盤に前の方で相手を抜くと\\n速度がわずかに上がり\\nさらに加速力がほ: <size=22>Increase speed slightly, and acceleration very slightly when overtaking in the front group during Final Leg\n</size>
text.レース後半に差を付けて先頭にいると\\n速度をわずかに上げる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed if you lead with a margin in Final Leg\n</size>
text.最終直線で前と差が詰まると\\n速度が少し上がる: <size=22>Lightly increase speed when closing down the leader on the final straight\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降で前の方にいると\\n加速力がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Slightly increase acceleration from final corner onward when leading\n</size>
text.最終直線で前の方で少し抜け出ていると\\n速度が少し上がる: <size=22>If you're in front at the final straight and manage to break out a little, increase speed a little\n</size>
text.残り200m地点で前の方にいると\\n少し抜け出しやすくなる: <size=22>If you're in the front when there's 200m remaining, passing becomes a bit easier\n</size>
text.レース中間からロングスパートをかけて\\n速度がちょっとずつ上がる: <size=22>From the middle of the race very slightly increase your speed by running a long spurt\n</size>
text.残り200mを切って前の方にいると\\n速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed when close to the lead in last 200m\n</size>
text.レース後半に前の方で\\n1番になる力をちょっと発揮する: <size=22>Display a bit of your ability to take 1st place during the latter half of the race\n</size>
text.最終直線が迫ったとき好位置にいると\\n弾みを付けて加速力がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Carry momentum and slightly increase acceleration when approaching the final straight in a good position \n</size>
text.最終直線で後ろの方から追い抜くと\\n速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Your speed increases slightly when passing during the last straight\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に後ろの方から\\n外を回って追い抜いていると\\n最終直線で速: <size=22>Slightly increase speed on final straight when you made an outside pass in or after the final corner\n</size>
text.最終コーナーで前の方にいると\\n速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed if you're at the front after the last corner\n</size>
text.最終直線で余力を持って前にいると\\nちょっと優位を保ちやすくなる: <size=22>If you're in front during the last straight with spare energy, it becomes easier to keep a good position\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前の方で\\n前または後ろのウマ娘と距離が近いと\\n速度がわ: <size=22>Slightly increase speed in or after the final corner when a horsegirl is close ahead or behind\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降で外から追い抜くと\\n速度をわずかに上げる\\n中盤競り合って: <size=22>Slightly increase speed when passing from outside in or after the final corner, more so after battling in the Middle Leg\n</size>
text.レース終盤に3回追い抜くと\\n最終直線で速度が少し上がる: <size=22>Overtake 3 times in Final Leg to lightly increase speed in the final straight\n</size>
text.最終コーナーで中団以降から追い抜くと\\n速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed in the final corner when passing from the midfield or lower\n</size>
text.レース終盤に2回追い抜くと\\n速度をわずかに上げ\\nコース取りがわずかにうま: <size=22>Slightly increase speed and positioning when passing twice in the Final Leg\n</size>
text.レース終盤のコーナーで先頭にいると\\n加速力をわずかに上げる: <size=22>On last corner, slightly gain acceleration when in the first position\n</size>
text.レース後半の直線で好位置にいる\\nまたは中団から前を狙うと\\nわずかに駆けて: <size=22>Increase speed slightly on a straight in the latter half when in a good position or moving up from the middle of the pack\n</size>
text.レース後半に好位置で競り合うと\\n速度をわずかに上げる: <size=22>Competing for a good position in the race's latter half increases your speed\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前の方で追い抜くと\\n速度をわずかに上げる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed when passing in the front group in or after the final corner\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前の方で競り合うと\\n直線でちょっと抜け出しやすくなる: <size=22>Break out a little easier in the final straight after battling in or after the final corner\n</size>
text.レース後半に中団から\\n速度をちょっとずつ上げ前方のウマ娘を\\nほんのちょっ: <size=22>In the race's second half, gradually increase speed and slightly slow girls ahead from the middle of the pack.\n</size>
text.最終直線までみずから崩れることなく\\n前の方にいるとわずかに速度が上がる: <size=22>Lead without letting up until final straight to increase your speed slightly\n</size>
text.レース終盤のコーナーで前の位置に\\nつこうとして加速力がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Your acceleration increases slightly while keeping a good position during the Final Leg's corners\n</size>
text.レース中間に好位置で少し疲れてくると\\nちょっと前へ踏み込む: <size=22>If you get a little tired while being in a good position in the middle of the race, your speed and acceleration increase slightly\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に追い抜いて\\n先団についていると最終直線で\\n速度がわずか: <size=22>Slightly increase speed on the final straight when making a pass in the leading group in or after the final corner\n</size>
text.残り300m付近で前の方だと速度を\\nちょっと上げる、ちょうど坂を上り\\nき: <size=22>Increase speed a little when in the leading places with around 300m to go, slightly more so after just climbing a hill\n</size>
text.レース後半のコーナーで控えていると\\n持久力をわずかに回復し\\nさらに少しの: <size=22>Recover a bit of energy and slightly increase speed for a while when holding steady in a latter race half corner\n</size>
text.最終直線で先頭から離されていると\\n速度がわずかに上がる\\n最後方付近にいる: <size=22>When far from the front on the final straight, increase speed slightly. More so if all the way near the back\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に競り合っていると\\n最終直線で前方にいる時\\n速度がわずか: <size=22>Slightly increase speed when in the lead group on the final straight after battling in or after the final corner\n</size>
text.最終直線まで冷静に自身の計画通り\\n走行出来れば、先頭目がけて\\n速度をわず: <size=22>If you manage to keep your composure until the final straight, your speed will increase slightly\n</size>
text.レース中間付近で好位置にいる時に\\n追い抜くとちょっと進出を開始する: <size=22>Gain slight momentum while in a good position when passing someone in the Middle Leg\n</size>
text.最終直線を走行中に競り合うと\\n速度をわずかに上げる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed when competing on the final straight\n</size>
text.レース後半に中団から仕掛け始める時に\\n加速力をちょっとずつ上げる: <size=22>In the race's second half, increase acceleration very slightly if you start overtaking from the middle of the pack\n</size>
text.レース後半に前の方で競り合うと\\n速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Your speed increases slightly on the later half of the race when in front competing for the lead\n</size>
text.レース中盤で好位置にいる時に\\n持久力が少し回復する: <size=22>Slightly recover energy when in a good position during the Middle Leg\n</size>
text.レース中盤の直線で前の方にいるとき\\n後ろのウマ娘と距離が近いと\\n譲らない: <size=22>Turn your refusal to yield into strength when your lead's about to be taken during the Middle Leg\n</size>
text.最終直線を走行中に好位置で\\n追い抜くまたは詰め寄られると\\nわずかに速度を: <size=22>If you overtake or are about to be overtaken on the final straight while in a good position, your speed will increase slightly\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降で中団から\\n前へ出る時、速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed in or after the last corner when coming up from the back of the pack\n</size>
text.レース中盤のコーナーで競り合っていた\\n場合、終盤かつ最終コーナー半ば以降に\: <size=22>Increase acceleration slightly when in a good position from the 2nd half of a Final Leg Corner on, and having battled in a Mid Leg Corner\n</size>
text.最終コーナーで後ろの方にいると近くの\\nウマ娘を見て持久力をわずかに回復する: <size=22>If you're in the back during the last corner, your endurance recovers slightly\n</size>
text.レース終盤に前方が詰まると\\nお告げ次第で道をわずかに切り開く: <size=22>Slightly easier to find an opening if blocked at the front in Final Leg\n</size>
text.レース終盤のコーナーで\\n中団以降のポジションから追い抜くと\\nちょっと前を: <size=22>During the Last Leg, if you overtake from outside the front of the pack during a corner, aim to move a little further forwards\n</size>
text.落ち着いたまま、中盤の仕掛けどころの\\nまたは終盤の勝負どころのコーナーを\\: <size=22>Having kept your calm in the middle of the pack, acceleration will increase slightly during the decisive Middle or Final Leg corner\n</size>
text.レース終盤で3番手の時に負けそうに\\nなると速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>When you're in 3rd place at the end of the race and about to lose, your speed slightly increases\n</size>
text.レースを冷静に運ぶことができると残り\\n200mで実力発揮、速度が少し上がる: <size=22>After proceeding through the race calmly, your speed increases a little during the last 200m\n</size>
text.レース中間付近で中団にいるとき\\n持久力をわずかに回復し\\nさらに速度をちょ: <size=22>Slightly increase speed and recover a bit of energy when in the midfield around mid distance\n</size>
text.最終直線に入ったとき好位置につけて\\nいると速度がわずかに上がる\\n先頭が近: <size=22>Increase speed slightly when entering the final straight in a good position, more so when near the lead\n</size>
text.前方にいるとき、レース後半の第3コー\\nナーで速度をちょっと上げる、または\\: <size=22>Increase speed a little when in the lead group in the third corner after half distance, or push forwards on the track's back side during the Final Leg\n</size>
text.残り300mを切って好位置にいるとき\\n前のウマ娘との距離が近いと\\n速度が: <size=22>Increase speed slightly when in a good position close to the girl ahead with less than 300m to go\n</size>
text.最終直線で後ろのウマ娘と距離が近いと\\n持久力をわずかに使い\\n少しの間速度: <size=22>When the horsegirl behind is close on the final straight, increase your speed for a short while at the cost of a tiny bit of stamina\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に追い抜いていた場合\\n残り300mを切って先団にいるとき\\: <size=22>Increase speed slightly when in the leading group with 300m to go, having made a pass from the Final Corner on\n</size>
text.レース後半に中団から残り持久力に\\n応じたロングスパートをかけて\\n速度をほ: <size=22>Start a long spurt based on remaining energy from the midfield in the race's latter half, continuously increasing speed a tiny amount\n</size>
text.中盤で2回スキルを使うと\\n持久力がわずかに回復する: <size=22>Restore endurance slightly if you activate two skills in the middle part of the race\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に\\n前の方で追いすがっていると\\n最終直線を走行中速度が少: <size=22>Slightly increase speed on the last straight when chasing someone close to the lead in or after the final corner\n</size>
text.スキルで持久力を回復すると\\nレース後半で前のほうにいる時に\\nわずかに速度: <size=22>In the race's second half, increase speed slightly when recovering endurance with skills while in front\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に先団で追い抜くと\\n少しの間速度が少し上がる: <size=22>Increase speed for a short while when overtaking in the midfield from the final corner on\n</size>
text.スキルで持久力を3回以上回復すると\\nレース後半で勝利に向かい\\nちょっと呼: <size=22>After recovering HP with skills thrice, take a breath and break for victory\n</size>
text.中盤に後ろの方で順位を下げた時に\\n持久力を少し回復する: <size=22>Slightly recover energy when when your order drops in the trailing pack during Middle Leg\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に前めで力が尽きかけ\\n詰め寄られると速度をわずかに上げ続ける: <size=22>Continuously increase speed slightly in or after the last corner when being pressed in the lead group and stamina is running out\n</size>
text.最終コーナーで中団から前を狙う時\\n加速力をわずかに上げる: <size=22>On last corner, slightly gain acceleration when aiming for the lead from the middle pack\n</size>
text.残り400m地点で先団だと少しの間\\n速度をわずかに上げる、それまでに7回\\: <size=22>Increase speed slightly when heading the mid pack a little, moderately so if you've used 7 skills\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に先団で\\n詰め寄られるとわずかに速度を上げる: <size=22>If you're about to be overtaken at the front after the final corner, your speed will increase slightly\n</size>
text.レース中盤で前の方から\\n仕掛け始める時に速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed in Middle Leg when overtaking someone close to lead\n</size>
text.終盤の直線で前の方にいると速度を\\nわずかに上げる、そこが向正面の場合\\nさ: <size=22>Slightly increase speed when leading on a Final Leg straight, also increase acceleration very slightly when on the back side of the track\n</size>
text.スタート後からレース後半まで\\n好位置を維持し続けると\\nレース中盤に速度を: <size=22>Maintain a good position until the latter race half to increase speed slightly in the Middle Leg\n</size>
text.最終コーナーで前の方で抜くと速度が後\\nろの方で抜くと加速力がわずかに上がる: <size=22>On last corner, slightly gain speed when passing in front or acceleration when passing in back\n</size>
text.中盤のコーナーで先団を走行中\\n後ろに他ウマ娘がいるとほんのわずかに\\n息を: <size=22>When running in front of the pack during a Middle Leg corner with another horsegirl behind, take a tiny breath and increase your speed slightly\n</size>
text.レース中盤を好位置で走行中に\\n詰め寄られると前方のウマ娘から\\n持久力をわ: <size=22>Drain a bit of energy from girls in front when approaching the Middle Leg in a good position\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に3回追い抜くと\\n最終直線で速度をわずかに上げ続ける: <size=22>When overtaking thrice from the final corner on, continually speed up slightly on the final straight.\n</size>
text.最終コーナー走行中に中団で競り合うと\\nちょっと抜け出しやすくなる: <size=22>If you're blocked in the middle of the pack at the final corner, it will become a little easier to get out\n</size>
text.最終直線を好位置で走行中\\n前のウマ娘との距離が近いと\\nちょっと抜け出しや: <size=22>If you're in front after the final corner and about to overtake another girl, your speed and acceleration will increase slightly\n</size>
text.最終コーナーで先頭から離されていると\\nその距離が遠いほど頑張り続けて\\n速: <size=22>When away from the front at the last corner, gradually increase your speed slightly, persisting longer the further away you are\n</size>
text.レース後半に後方で詰め寄られると\\n幸運パワーが身体に実り\\n速度がわずかに: <size=22>Increase speed slightly when chasing the back of the pack in the Final Leg\n</size>
text.最終コーナー以降に追い抜いていた場合\\n最終直線中団から速度をわずかに上げる\: <size=22>Increase speed slightly from the middle pack on the final straight, having made a pass from the final corner on. Spur yourself on a little longer when not popular\n</size>
text.レース前半、掛からず最後方付近に\\n控え続けていると、最終直線で\\n加速力が: <size=22>Increase acceleration slightly on the final straight, having kept your cool in the trailing group during the race's first half\n</size>
text.レーシングカーニバルで獲得するカーニ\\nバルptにボーナスが付く（＋{0}％）: <size=22>Confers a bonus to pts obtained in Racing Carnival (+{0}%). This skill will disappear after the event.\n</size>
text.レーシングカーニバルで基礎能力+{0}\\n％、さらに{1}％の確率で絶好調にな: <size=22>Increase stats in Racing Carnival by +{0}%, and have a {1}% chance to max your mood. This skill will disappear after the event.\n</size>
text.スタートがすごく苦手になり出遅れたり\\nスタート時の加速力が低下したりする\\: <size=22>Makes the start of the race very difficult and lowers your acceleration tremendously. This skill will disappear after training.\n</size>
